mapper.sql: INT_ID, NAME, CITY_ID, COUNTRY_ID, IS_INDOOR, IS_RRU, IS_GF, IS_OR, IS_RR, IS_SR, WY_BTS_INT_ID, DELETE_FLAG, MANUAL_FLAG, DELETETIME, UPDATETIME,DELETE_RESONCODE,DELETE_TEXT, BTSID,CELLID,BSC_NAME,CI,PN,LAC,DO_CELL,RELATED_BTS

u.INT_ID, u.NAME, u.CITY_ID, u.COUNTRY_ID, u.IS_INDOOR,u.IS_RRU, u.IS_GF, u.IS_OR, u.IS_RR, u.IS_SR,u.WY_BTS_INT_ID, u.DELETE_FLAG, u.MANUAL_FLAG, u.DELETETIME, u.UPDATETIME,u.DELETE_RESONCODE,u.DELETE_TEXT, u.BTSID,u.CELLID,u.BSC_NAME,u.CI,u.PN,u.LAC,u.DO_CELL,u.RELATED_BTS
mapper.update:
update WY_CELL
MANUAL_FLAG = #{manualFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETE_RESONCODE = #{deleteResoncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETE_TEXT = #{deleteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1=1
and INT_ID=#{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from ( SELECT
${sqlsb} ,count(1) num FROM (SELECT a.name,A.City_Id, A.Country_Id,e.name cityname,f.name countryname,a.CELLID,b.msc_name,a.bsc_name, a.btsid,a.ci,a.pn,(case(a.do_cell) when 0 then '1X' when 1 then 'DO' when 2 then '1X+DO' end) do_cell,a.is_indoor,a.is_rru,a.is_gf,d.name WY_BTS_NAME,b.bts_name,d.longitude,d.latitude,c.celltype,b.capacity,b.pn_inc,b.numfa,b.numfa_do, d.vendor_btstype,g.tower_type,g.tower_high,c.feederlength FROM wy_cell a LEFT JOIN c_cell b ON a.int_id=b.int_id LEFT JOIN wy_cell_manual c ON a.int_id=c.int_id LEFT JOIN wy_bts d ON a.WY_BTS_INT_ID=d.int_id LEFT JOIN wy_bts_manual g ON a.wy_bts_int_id=g.int_id LEFT JOIN wy_city e ON a.city_id=e.id LEFT JOIN wy_city f ON a.COUNTRY_ID=f.id where 1=1 AND a.delete_flag=0 )
1=1
and city_id in(${cityIds})
GROUP BY
${sqlsb}
)
